metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8396 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed inGNU Binutils 2.28, is vulnerable to an invalid read of size 1 because theexisting reloc offset range tests didn't catch small negative offsets lessthan the size of the reloc field. This vulnerability causes programs thatconduct an analysis of binary programs using the libbfd library, such asobjdump, to crash.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
